mapper.sql: id, enterprise_id,rtc_enterprise_uuid, name, telephone, url, email, address, country_region, gmt_create, gmt_modified, status
mapper.insert: insert into qcc (id, enterprise_id,rtc_enterprise_uuid, name, telephone, url, email, address, country_region, gmt_create, gmt_modified, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rtcEnterpriseUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into qcc
id,
enterprise_id,
rtc_enterprise_uuid,
name,
telephone,
url,
email,
address,
country_region,
gmt_create,
gmt_modified,
status,
synopsis,
nation,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rtcEnterpriseUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{countryRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{synopsis,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update qcc
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rtc_enterprise_uuid = #{rtcEnterpriseUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country_region = #{countryRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
synopsis = #{synopsis,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update qcc set enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rtc_enterprise_uuid = #{rtcEnterpriseUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country_region = #{countryRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, synopsis = #{synopsis,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT qcc.id, qcc.enterprise_id enterpriseId, IF ( qbi.english_name = '-', qcc.NAME, qbi.english_name ) name, qbi.registered_capital registeredCapital, qbi.legal_representative legalRepresentative, qbi.establishment_date establishmentDate, qcc.address, qcc.country_region countryRegion, qcc.nation FROM qcc LEFT JOIN qcc_business_information qbi ON qcc.enterprise_id = qbi.enterprise_id WHERE qcc.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} AND qbi.english_name LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%') UNION SELECT qcc.id, qcc.enterprise_id enterpriseId, IF ( qbi.english_name = '-', qcc.NAME, qbi.english_name ) name, qbi.registered_capital registeredCapital, qbi.legal_representative legalRepresentative, qbi.establishment_date establishmentDate, qcc.address, qcc.country_region countryRegion, qcc.nation FROM qcc LEFT JOIN qcc_business_information qbi ON qcc.enterprise_id = qbi.enterprise_id WHERE qcc.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and qcc.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')

SELECT qcc.id, qcc.enterprise_id, IF ( qbi.english_name != '-' OR qbi.english_name != NULL, qbi.english_name, qcc.NAME ) NAME, qbi.registered_capital, qbi.legal_representative, qbi.establishment_date, qcc.address, qcc.telephone, qcc.url, qcc.synopsis, qcc.country_region, qcc.nation, `qcc_shareholder`.`id` qs_id, `qcc_shareholder`.`enterprise_id` qs_enterprise_id, qcc_shareholder.`name` qs_name, `qcc_shareholder`.`ratio` qs_ratio, `qcc_shareholder`.`subscribed_capital` qs_subscribed_capital, `qcc_shareholder`.`subscribed_capital_date` qs_subscribed_capital_date FROM qcc LEFT JOIN qcc_business_information qbi ON qcc.enterprise_id = qbi.enterprise_id LEFT JOIN `qcc_shareholder` ON qcc.enterprise_id = `qcc_shareholder`.`enterprise_id` WHERE qcc.`status` = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} AND qcc.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT qcc_administrative_license.id, qcc_administrative_license.enterprise_id enterpriseId, qcc_administrative_license.decision_document_no decisionDocumentNo, qcc_administrative_license.license_authority licenseAuthority, qcc_administrative_license.license_date licenseDate, qcc_administrative_license.content, qcc_administrative_license.valid_from validFrom, qcc_administrative_license.valid_until validUntil, qcc_administrative_license.decision_document_name decisionDocumentName FROM qcc_administrative_license WHERE qcc_administrative_license.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and qcc_administrative_license.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT `qcc_annual_report`.`id`, `qcc_annual_report`.`uuid`, `qcc_annual_report`.`enterprise_id`, `qcc_annual_report`.`year`, `qcc_annual_report`.`unified_social_credit_code`, `qcc_annual_report`.`registration_number`, `qcc_annual_report`.`business_status`, `qcc_annual_report`.`business_telephone`, `qcc_annual_report`.`e_mail`, `qcc_annual_report`.`post_code`, `qcc_annual_report`.`staff_number`, `qcc_annual_report`.`equity_transfer`, `qcc_annual_report`.`purchase_equity`, `qcc_annual_report`.`postal_address`, `qcc_annual_report`.`total_assets`, `qcc_annual_report`.`total_equity`, `qcc_annual_report`.`total_operating_income`, `qcc_annual_report`.`total_profit`, `qcc_annual_report`.`net_profit`, `qcc_annual_report`.`main_business_income`, `qcc_annual_report`.`total_tax`, `qcc_annual_report`.`total_liabilities`, `qcc_annual_report`.`endowment_insurance`, `qcc_annual_report`.`medical_insurance`, `qcc_annual_report`.`maternity_insurance`, `qcc_annual_report`.`unemployment_insurance`, `qcc_annual_report`.`employment_injury_insurance`, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`id` s_id, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`annual_report_uuid` s_annual_report_uuid, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`enterprise_id` s_enterprise_id, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`name` s_name, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`subscribed_capital` s_subscribed_capital, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`subscribed_capital_date` s_subscribed_capital_date, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`subscribed_capital_way` s_subscribed_capital_way, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`paid_capital` s_paid_capital, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`paid_capital_date` s_paid_capital_date, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`paid_capital_way` s_paid_capital_way FROM `qcc_annual_report` LEFT JOIN qcc_annual_report_shareholder ON qcc_annual_report.uuid = qcc_annual_report_shareholder.annual_report_uuid WHERE qcc_annual_report.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and `qcc_annual_report`.`enterprise_id` = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, enterprise_id enterpriseId, name, code, qualification_type qualificationType, competent_tax_authority competentTaxAuthority, valid_from validFrom, valid_end validEnd from qcc_general_taxpayer where enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and `status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

select id, enterprise_id enterpriseId, name, duty, shareholding_ratio shareholdingRatio, ultimate_beneficial_shares ultimateBeneficialShares from qcc_keyman where enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and `status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

SELECT `qcc_bidding`.`id`,`qcc_bidding`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_bidding`.`name`,`qcc_bidding`.`province`,`qcc_bidding`.`progress` FROM `qcc_bidding` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`id`, `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`location`, `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`purpose`, `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`area`, `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`administrative_region` administrativeRegion, `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`land_supply_mode` landSupplyMode, `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`contract_signing_date` contractSigningDate FROM `qcc_land_purchase_information` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT `qcc_supplier`.`id`, `qcc_supplier`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_supplier`.`name`, `qcc_supplier`.`proportion_of_procurement` proportionOfProcurement, `qcc_supplier`.`purchase_amount` purchaseAmount, `qcc_supplier`.`report_period` reportPeriod, `qcc_supplier`.`source`, `qcc_supplier`.`relationship` FROM `qcc_supplier` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`id`, `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`determine_document_number` determineDocumentNumber, `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`violations_type` violationsType, `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`content`, `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`publication_date` publicationDate, `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`decision_making_organ` decisionMakingOrgan, `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`decision_date` decisionDate FROM `qcc_administrative_sanction` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT `qcc_financing_consultation`.`id`, `qcc_financing_consultation`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_financing_consultation`.`date`, `qcc_financing_consultation`.`name`, `qcc_financing_consultation`.`financing_round` financingRound, `qcc_financing_consultation`.`amount`, `qcc_financing_consultation`.`investor`, `qcc_financing_consultation`.`source` FROM `qcc_financing_consultation` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT `qcc_app`.`id`, `qcc_app`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_app`.`name`, `qcc_app`.`sort`, `qcc_app`.`current_version` currentVersion, `qcc_app`.`brief_introduction` briefIntroduction FROM `qcc_app` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT `qcc_applet`.`id`, `qcc_applet`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_applet`.`name`, `qcc_applet`.`sort`, `qcc_applet`.`associated_official_account` associatedOfficialAccount, `qcc_applet`.`predict_reading_volume` predictReadingVolume FROM `qcc_applet` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT `qcc_wechat`.`id`, `qcc_wechat`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_wechat`.`name`, `qcc_wechat`.`account`, `qcc_wechat`.`brief_introduction` briefIntroduction FROM `qcc_wechat` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT `qcc_weibo`.`id`, `qcc_weibo`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_weibo`.`nickname`, `qcc_weibo`.`industry_category` industryCategory, `qcc_weibo`.`brief_introduction` briefIntroduction FROM `qcc_weibo` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT `qcc_software_copyright`.`id`, `qcc_software_copyright`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_software_copyright`.`name`, `qcc_software_copyright`.`version`, `qcc_software_copyright`.`release_date` releaseDate, `qcc_software_copyright`.`abbreviation`, `qcc_software_copyright`.`registration_number` registrationNumber, `qcc_software_copyright`.`registration_approval_date` registrationApprovalDate FROM `qcc_software_copyright` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT qcc.id qcc_id, qcc.enterprise_id qcc_enterprise_id, `qcc_remove_exception`.`id` qre_id, `qcc_remove_exception`.`enterprise_id` qre_enterprise_id, `qcc_remove_exception`.`save_reason` qre_save_reason, `qcc_remove_exception`.`desicion_authority` qre_desicion_authority, `qcc_remove_exception`.`remove_date` qre_remove_date, `qcc_remove_exception`.`remove_reason` qre_remove_reason, `qcc_save_exception`.`id`, `qcc_save_exception`.`enterprise_id`, `qcc_save_exception`.`save_date`, `qcc_save_exception`.`desicion_authority`, `qcc_save_exception`.`save_reason` FROM qcc LEFT JOIN `qcc_remove_exception` ON qcc.enterprise_id = `qcc_remove_exception`.`enterprise_id` LEFT JOIN `qcc_save_exception` ON qcc.enterprise_id = `qcc_save_exception`.`enterprise_id` WHERE qcc.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and qcc.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

SELECT `qcc_client`.`id`, `qcc_client`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_client`.`name`, `qcc_client`.`sale_proportion` saleProportion, `qcc_client`.`sale_amount` saleAmount, `qcc_client`.`report_date` reportDate, `qcc_client`.`source`, `qcc_client`.`relationship` FROM `qcc_client` WHERE qcc_client.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and qcc_client.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

SELECT `qcc_court_notice`.`id`, `qcc_court_notice`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_court_notice`.`case_code` caseCode, `qcc_court_notice`.`court_date` courtDate, `qcc_court_notice`.`reason`, `qcc_court_notice`.`litigant` FROM `qcc_court_notice` WHERE qcc_court_notice.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and qcc_court_notice.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

SELECT `qcc_filing_information`.`id`, `qcc_filing_information`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_filing_information`.`code`, `qcc_filing_information`.`prosecutor`, `qcc_filing_information`.`defendant`, `qcc_filing_information`.`court_name` courtName, `qcc_filing_information`.`filing_date` filingDate FROM `qcc_filing_information` WHERE qcc_filing_information.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and qcc_filing_information.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

SELECT `qcc_administrative_license_china`.`id`, `qcc_administrative_license_china`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_administrative_license_china`.`code`, `qcc_administrative_license_china`.`authority`, `qcc_administrative_license_china`.`decided_date` decidedDate FROM `qcc_administrative_license_china` WHERE qcc_administrative_license_china.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and qcc_administrative_license_china.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

SELECT `qcc_tax_arrears_notice`.`id`, `qcc_tax_arrears_notice`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_tax_arrears_notice`.`type`, `qcc_tax_arrears_notice`.`balance`, `qcc_tax_arrears_notice`.`current_arrears` currentArrears, `qcc_tax_arrears_notice`.`release_company` releaseCompany, `qcc_tax_arrears_notice`.`release_date` releaseDate FROM `qcc_tax_arrears_notice` WHERE qcc_tax_arrears_notice.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and qcc_tax_arrears_notice.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

SELECT `qcc_equity_pledge`.`id`, `qcc_equity_pledge`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_equity_pledge`.`name`, `qcc_equity_pledge`.`shares`, `qcc_equity_pledge`.`value`, `qcc_equity_pledge`.`pledge_status` pledgeStatus, `qcc_equity_pledge`.`announcement_date` announcementDate FROM `qcc_equity_pledge` WHERE qcc_equity_pledge.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and qcc_equity_pledge.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

SELECT `qcc_equity_out_pledge`.`id`, `qcc_equity_out_pledge`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_equity_out_pledge`.`code`, `qcc_equity_out_pledge`.`pledgor`, `qcc_equity_out_pledge`.`pledgee`, `qcc_equity_out_pledge`.`enterprise`, `qcc_equity_out_pledge`.`amount`, `qcc_equity_out_pledge`.`registration_date` registrationDate, `qcc_equity_out_pledge`.`pledge_status` pledgeStatus FROM `qcc_equity_out_pledge` WHERE qcc_equity_out_pledge.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and qcc_equity_out_pledge.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

SELECT `qcc_shareholder_three`.`id`, `qcc_shareholder_three`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_shareholder_three`.`name`, `qcc_shareholder_three`.`ratio`, `qcc_shareholder_three`.`numbers`, `qcc_shareholder_three`.`gmt_create` gmtCreate, `qcc_shareholder_three`.`gmt_modified` gmtModified, `qcc_shareholder_three`.`status` status FROM `qcc_shareholder_three` WHERE qcc_shareholder_three.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and qcc_shareholder_three.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

SELECT `qcc_qualification`.`id`, `qcc_qualification`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_qualification`.`type`, `qcc_qualification`.`code`, `qcc_qualification`.`name`, `qcc_qualification`.`release_date` releaseDate, `qcc_qualification`.`validity`, `qcc_qualification`.`authority`, `qcc_qualification`.`gmt_create` gmtCreate, `qcc_qualification`.`gmt_modified` gmtModified, `qcc_qualification`.`status` status FROM `qcc_qualification` WHERE qcc_qualification.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and qcc_qualification.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

SELECT `qcc_out_investment`.`id`, `qcc_out_investment`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_out_investment`.`name`, `qcc_out_investment`.`legal_representative` legalRepresentative, `qcc_out_investment`.`registered_capital` registeredCapital, `qcc_out_investment`.`ratio`, `qcc_out_investment`.`amount`, `qcc_out_investment`.`release_date` releaseDate, `qcc_out_investment`.`investment_status` investmentStatus, `qcc_out_investment`.`round`, `qcc_out_investment`.`financing_date` financingDate, `qcc_out_investment`.`products_institutions` productsInstitutions, `qcc_out_investment`.`gmt_create` gmtCreate, `qcc_out_investment`.`gmt_modified` gmtModified, `qcc_out_investment`.`status` FROM `qcc_out_investment` WHERE qcc_out_investment.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and qcc_out_investment.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

SELECT `qcc_shareholder_investment`.`id`, `qcc_shareholder_investment`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_shareholder_investment`.`shareholder`, `qcc_shareholder_investment`.`ratio`, `qcc_shareholder_investment`.`subscribed_capital` subscribedCapital, `qcc_shareholder_investment`.`subscribed_date` subscribedDate, `qcc_shareholder_investment`.`publication`, `qcc_shareholder_investment`.`gmt_create` gmtCreate, `qcc_shareholder_investment`.`gmt_modified` gmtModified, `qcc_shareholder_investment`.`status` FROM `qcc_shareholder_investment` WHERE qcc_shareholder_investment.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and qcc_shareholder_investment.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

SELECT `qcc_equity_change`.`id`, `qcc_equity_change`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_equity_change`.`shareholder`, `qcc_equity_change`.`before`, `qcc_equity_change`.`after`, `qcc_equity_change`.`change_date` changeDate, `qcc_equity_change`.`release_date` releaseDate, `qcc_equity_change`.`gmt_create` gmtCreate, `qcc_equity_change`.`gmt_modified` gmtModified, `qcc_equity_change`.`status` FROM `qcc_equity_change` WHERE qcc_equity_change.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and qcc_equity_change.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

SELECT `qcc_change_record`.`id`, `qcc_change_record`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_change_record`.`change_date` changeDate, `qcc_change_record`.`change_content` changeContent, `qcc_change_record`.`before_change` beforeChange, `qcc_change_record`.`after_change` afterChange, `qcc_change_record`.`gmt_create` gmtCreate, `qcc_change_record`.`gmt_modified` gmtModified, `qcc_change_record`.`status` FROM `qcc_change_record` WHERE qcc_change_record.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and qcc_change_record.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

SELECT `qcc_spot_check`.`id`, `qcc_spot_check`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_spot_check`.`organization`, `qcc_spot_check`.`type`, `qcc_spot_check`.`inspection_date` inspectionDate, `qcc_spot_check`.`result`, `qcc_spot_check`.`gmt_create` gmtCreate, `qcc_spot_check`.`gmt_modified` gmtModified, `qcc_spot_check`.`status` FROM `qcc_spot_check` WHERE qcc_spot_check.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and qcc_spot_check.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

SELECT `qcc_judicial_auction`.`id`, `qcc_judicial_auction`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_judicial_auction`.`title`, `qcc_judicial_auction`.`start_price` startPrice, `qcc_judicial_auction`.`auction_time` auctionTime, `qcc_judicial_auction`.`court`, `qcc_judicial_auction`.`gmt_create` gmtCreate, `qcc_judicial_auction`.`gmt_modified` gmtModified, `qcc_judicial_auction`.`status` FROM `qcc_judicial_auction` WHERE qcc_judicial_auction.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and qcc_judicial_auction.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

SELECT `qcc_environmental_punishment`.`id`, `qcc_environmental_punishment`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_environmental_punishment`.`code`, `qcc_environmental_punishment`.`type`, `qcc_environmental_punishment`.`penalty_unite` penaltyUnite, `qcc_environmental_punishment`.`penalty_date` penaltyDate, `qcc_environmental_punishment`.`implementation`, `qcc_environmental_punishment`.`gmt_create` gmtCreate, `qcc_environmental_punishment`.`gmt_modified` gmtModified, `qcc_environmental_punishment`.`status` FROM `qcc_environmental_punishment` WHERE qcc_environmental_punishment.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and qcc_environmental_punishment.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

SELECT `qcc_tax_violation`.`id`, `qcc_tax_violation`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_tax_violation`.`release_date` releaseDate, `qcc_tax_violation`.`tax_authorities` taxAuthorities, `qcc_tax_violation`.`case_nature` caseNature, `qcc_tax_violation`.`illegal_fact` illegalFact, `qcc_tax_violation`.`basis_punishment` basisPunishment, `qcc_tax_violation`.`gmt_create` gmtCreate, `qcc_tax_violation`.`gmt_modified` gmtModified, `qcc_tax_violation`.`status` FROM `qcc_tax_violation` WHERE qcc_tax_violation.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and qcc_tax_violation.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}
